cast.name: 内瑞雅·巴德洛斯 Nerea Barros
文森特·罗米洛 Vicente Romero
伊格纳西奥·蒙特斯 Ignacio Montes
米格尔·阿尔瓦雷斯 Miguel Álvarez

director.name: 帕科·卡贝萨斯 Paco Cabezas
胡安·米格尔·德尔卡 Juan Miguel del Castillo

introduction: Susana Macaya, a young woman, is found murdered a few days before her wedding after having been brutally tortured in a heinous ritual. Coincidentally, her sister, Lara, suffered exactly the same fate seven years before. Only two scenarios could explain this: either this is a copycat killing or the man convicted for Lara's murder is innocent. Inspector Elena Blanco is assigned to the case as head of the Homicide Analysis Bureau, a police department created to solve the most complicated and horrific crimes. Now, in order to discover who murdered Susana, Elena must immerse herself in the complex world of gypsy culture.
